title: Hurry, the Nordstrom Winter Sale Is Almost Overâ€”These Last-Chance Items Are Worth It
excerpt: The Nordstrom Winter Sale is ending soon, and you have to see these 31 last-chance items before it's over.
text: If you haven't heard the good news yet, Nordstrom's Winter Sale is on through February 17, and with up to 60% off chic closet staples, it's too good to skip. I'm talking about elevated knitwear, timeless coats, classic winter boots, and beautiful tailored pieces you can snag for a fraction of the price right now from the brands you know and love from Nordstrom.While there are pages upon pages of amazing items on sale, it's my job to save you time and curate the best of the best. I did a deep dive into Nordstrom's Winter Sale and found 30 last-chance items worth adding to your cart that are easier on your wallet. Whether you're looking for one key piece to complete your winter capsule wardrobe or revamping your closet entirely, below are the standout items currently on major sale. Lauren Ralph Lauren Faux Shearling Coat Shearling is always a good choice. MANGO Pocket Tweed Jacket Good American Reversible Neoprene Pencil Midi Skirt La Canadienne Braydon Waterproof Chelsea Boot Talk about boots you'll wear for years. Reformation Brooklyn Organic Cotton Sweater Favorite Daughter The City Tweed Coat Extra-long coats are trending. Lauren Ralph Lauren Fisherman Cotton Quarter Zip Sweater I can't resist a fisherman sweater. Steve Madden Dagne Knee High Boot Treasure & Bond Crewneck Cotton Blend Cardigan The exact shade of gray every fashion person is after right now. Steve Madden Dusty Bootie SANDRO Long Wool-Blend Coat I love the strong shoulders. Lauren Ralph Lauren Longline Wool Blend Reefer Coat Isabel Marant Denvee Tall Western Boot Isabel Marant on sale? Run. Madewell Chunky Alpaca Blend V-Neck Cardigan The perfect travel sweater. Madewell Sweater Maxi Dress Consider your styling for this dress done. MANGO Classic Double Breasted Water Repellent Cotton Trench Coat Open Edit Double Breasted Blazer If you don't have a good black blazer, now is the time to buy one. Vince Herringbone Tweed Double Breasted Coat Herringbone feels so refined. Far from your average cardigan. HOKA Clifton 9 Running Shoe I have these in black and can confirm how comfortable they are. Faherty Frost Cable Stitch Turtleneck Alpaca Blend Sweater COS Tailored Wool Blend Jacket I love the structure on this one. Topshop Faux Leather Midi Skirt Just think of the styling options. AFRM Biona One-Shoulder Ruched Mesh Maxi Dress Free People Sunbeam Oversize Turtleneck Sweater MANGO Oversize Crop Jacket Talk about a jacket that goes with everything. Free People Butterfly Babe Cutout Maxi Dress Wait until you see the back. ASTR the Label Off the Shoulder Long Sleeve Dress Dress this up or down with ease.
html:
If you haven't heard the good news yet, Nordstrom's Winter Sale is on through February 17, and with up to 60% off chic closet staples, it's too good to skip. I'm talking about elevated knitwear, timeless coats, classic winter boots, and beautiful tailored pieces you can snag for a fraction of the price right now from the brands you know and love from Nordstrom.

While there are pages upon pages of amazing items on sale, it's my job to save you time and curate the best of the best. I did a deep dive into Nordstrom's Winter Sale and found 30 last-chance items worth adding to your cart that are easier on your wallet. Whether you're looking for one key piece to complete your winter capsule wardrobe or revamping your closet entirely, below are the standout items currently on major sale.

Faux Shearling Coat

Shearling is always a good choice.
